show.title: The Lost Heir Rises
show.sharing_text: हेलो! मैंने कुकू एफएम पर इस शो को सुना और मेरे ख्‍याल से आपको भी पसंद आएगा
show.sharing_text_v2:
हेलो! मैंने Kuku FM (Android)  पर यह शो सुना और मुझे यकीन है कि आपको भी यह जरूर पसंद आएगा। 
https://links.kukufm.com/eTKfMX
show.description: After a tragic accident leaves Raj paralyzed, his once-promising life shatters. But his wife Maya refuses to give up. Battling poverty, prejudice, and her own fears, she becomes his unwavering pillar of strength. Through her relentless efforts and unconditional love, Raj finds the courage to fight back  and when he finally rises, it's not just a recovery, but a victory forged by her resilience and devotion.
show.description_secondary: After a tragic accident leaves Raj paralyzed, his once-promising life shatters. But his wife Maya refuses to give up. Battling poverty, prejudice, and her own fears, she becomes his unwavering pillar of strength. Through her relentless efforts and unconditional love, Raj finds the courage to fight back  and when he finally rises, it's not just a recovery, but a victory forged by her resilience and devotion.
